meanings.definition: The parents of one's father or mother.
meanings.sent1: My grandparents always tell the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my grandparents on weekends.
meanings.sent3: My grandparents are like walking history books!
meanings.sent4: To me, grandparents are the roots that hold our family tree together.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of my grandparents fills our home with warmth.

meanings.sent1: My grandparents are the kindest people I know.
meanings.sent2: I cherish the wisdom passed down by my grandparents.
meanings.sent3: My grandparents always have a secret stash of candies!
meanings.sent4: In my eyes, grandparents are like guardian angels watching over us.
meanings.sent5: The love of my grandparents is a treasure beyond measure.
